thread.title: Mobiliya Is Now a QuEST Global Company

author: cnbc.com
title: Mobiliya Is Now a QuEST Global Company

organizations.name: global company leading global software engineering company will accelerate digital transformation

text:
Leading Global Software Engineering Company Will Accelerate Digital Transformation in Various Industry Verticals
DALLAS, April 03, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Mobiliya , a digital transformation and innovation engineering services company, announces it has been recently acquired by QuEST Global Services group. QuEST is an international global leader in providing premium engineering solutions across diverse and specialized domains including: aero engines, aerospace & defense, high-tech & industrial, medical devices, oil & gas, and power & transportation. Mobiliya will add technical expertise in digital transformation technologies such as artificial intelligence, deep learning, augmented & virtual reality and the Internet of Things while QuEST’s vast domain industrial knowledge and scalable processes will create industry-first solutions in these industries.
Since its inception in 2011, Mobiliya has been an innovative product development and end-to-end services company with focus on emerging technologies. The company has been a strategic supplier and partner for leading enterprises like Microsoft, Google, HP, NVIDIA and Samsung with a global presence in Canada, China, India, South Korea and Silicon Valley in the U.S. Over the last six years, Mobiliya has grown from a team of 18 to over 450 while collecting multiple industry and customer accolades.
Here is what the leadership of QuEST and Mobiliya have to say about the acquisition by QuEST Global:
Ajit Prabhu, CEO of QuEST Global
“This acquisition, one of the ten we have done over the last five years, brings immense value to QuEST Global and our customers. The Mobiliya team and its services will help satisfy a long-standing demand from our customers to lead our industry in digital transformation. We look forward to a productive future as one entity that can address both industrial and technical challenges in a converging world.”
Krish Kupathil, CEO of Mobiliya
“I am excited about the acquisition of Mobiliya by QuEST Global. The next-gen tech expertise and experience Mobiliya brings in is hugely complementary to QuEST’s expertise in the industrial and mechanical world. The Mobiliya team will continue our pursuit of creating highly differentiated and innovative services and solutions offerings together with QuEST Global’s domain experts.”
Ankush Tiwari, CTO of Mobiliya
“It has been a fantastic journey for us—we have grown from a couple of engineers to over 450+ engineers in only six years. Innovation using next-gen technologies has always been the focus for Mobiliya. As a result, during our six-year journey, we created a niche product engineering organization enabling digital transformation solutions for our customers. QuEST’s strong domain expertise in core engineering verticals enables the team to create the solutions of the future as per our customer’s needs.”
Maxence Cacheux, Senior Vice President, Sales & Business Development for Mobiliya
“For our customers globally and for new business development activities, the acquisition will bring in great value in terms of wider market reach, domain knowledge and offerings. We are thrilled to work with QuEST’s global teams to explore new markets and opportunities."
Thomas Winkler, Vice President, Strategic Initiatives for Mobiliya
“Mobiliya and QuEST are an outstanding fit for one another. QuEST´s large global presence, strong customer orientation and proven processes for achieving scale, along with the strong need for digital transformation in the industry segments it serves, opens up large demand for Mobiliya´s offerings. Likewise, Mobiliya´s competence in areas like Internet of Things, augmented and virtual reality, machine learning, big data and digital transformation will add great value to QuEST´s customers.”
To summarize, the next phase of industrial growth will be driven largely by connected devices powered by AI, IoT and AR. Mobiliya, with its expertise in these digital transformation areas, will serve as advanced technology enabler for QuEST focus industries.
ABOUT MOBILIYA: Mobiliya is a global design and engineering services company enabling digital transformation for the world’s leading organizations through disruptive technologies. The company specializes in next-gen technology consulting, system integration, solution development, deployment and security. The company’s end-to-end services in niche engineering areas coupled with an innovation-intensive approach, spearheads the success for Mobiliya’s customers and employees. Based on the strong foundation of its core software engineering capabilities, Mobiliya is setting and realizing technology benchmarks for its customers in industries including: automotive, healthcare, energy, telecommunications, logistics and more. For more information, please visit www.mobiliya.com
ABOUT QuEST GLOBAL: As a complete lifecycle product development and production engineering partner to many of the world's most recognized brands, QuEST Global enables its customers to increase profitability and transform their businesses through innovative and industry-leading solutions. Through a collaborative approach and by using proven consultative tools, QuEST helps its customers define, develop and execute at every stage, from design, to production, and aftermarket, improving efficiency, speeding time to market and reducing costs. For more information, visit https://www.quest-global.com/ .
MEDIA CONTACT: Leslie Licano, Beyond Fifteen Communications, Inc.
